Articles.Content:
I should add that the moons, especially around Jool, are my favorite aspect. I love the Duna icecaps, but would like a little more variety in the landscape. on Duna.

I neard Nova won an award for his Fjords....

I should add that the moons, especially around Jool, are my favorite aspect. I love the Duna icecaps, but would like a little more variety in the landscape. on Duna.

I neard Nova won an award for his Fjords....

Hahaha, I wonder how many people get that, best book ever.

Yeah, I like the moons, especially Laythe, pretty fun to land on the Islands and not miss into the SEA! *glub glub glub*

you sir deserve an award for such a great reference.

So far I have been unsuccessful with all my lander designs just leaveing the atmosphere but jool is fun to fly on

But there will always be room in my heart for more planets, moons and maybe someday other solar systems

Hahaha, I wonder how many people get that, best book ever.

Yeah, I like the moons, especially Laythe, pretty fun to land on the Islands and not miss into the SEA! *glub glub glub*

I love the Islands
I love and hate them. I haven't been able to do a successful transfer orbit yet.

Gas giants have always fascinated me and I was really looking forward to Jool. When I got there I came in too close and hit atmosphere and I got scared, no terrified, *in real life* which was very bizarre to me. So I would say I'm pleased with the planets Except I still think Moho should be called Char!
